# compliance-checker

> Check regulatory compliance (GDPR, HIPAA, SOC2, ISO27001)

## Quick Reference

- **Type**: OSSA Agent v0.4.0
- **Category**: compliance
- **Manifest**: compliance-checker.ossa.yaml

## Overview

Verify OSSA agents meet regulatory compliance requirements:
- GDPR (data protection)
- HIPAA (healthcare)
- SOC2 (security controls)
- ISO27001 (information security)

## Related

- Main OSSA documentation: /README.md
- Agent manifest: ./compliance-checker.ossa.yaml
- Agent details: ./AGENTS.md
